title: PSYC 300A Behaviour Disorders - BEHAVIOUR DISORD
description: The definition, history, and scope of deviant behaviour; emphasis on the psychological factors that control its origins, maintenance, and modification.
prerequisites: (Either (a) PSYC 100, or (b) all of PSYC 101, PSYC 102, or (c) 6 credits of 200-level Psychology (but not 205 or 263).)
